title: Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, Pair up to 100 Speakers,IPX7 Waterproof Speaker Wireless Bluetooth-V5.3, HiFi Stereo Sound, 1100mins Playtime, Portable Speaker for Home, Outdoor, Party
descriptions:
Raymate Bluetooth Speakers – HiFi Stereo, IPX7 Waterproof, Bluetooth 5.3, 15+ Hrs Playtime, Type‑C, Party Pairing up to 100

Bring big, balanced sound anywhere. The Raymate Bluetooth Speaker combines a golden‑ratio cylindrical design with advanced audio engineering for immersive HiFi stereo that stays clear and distortion‑free—indoors, outdoors, and at every party.

Key features:
- Massive party pairing: Wirelessly link up to 100 Raymate speakers for room‑filling, venue‑wide sound.
- HiFi stereo clarity: Dual speaker drivers and a powerful amplifier module deliver rich lows, detailed mids, and crisp highs without distortion.
- Advanced audio processing: Tuned for an even, balanced sound profile at all volumes.
- IPX7 waterproof and rugged: Integrated structure protects against rain, dust, snow, and splashes—perfect for pools, beaches, and trails.
- All‑day battery: 3600 mAh battery for over 15 hours (up to ~1100 minutes) of continuous playtime.
- Latest Bluetooth 5.3: Faster, more stable connections with lower latency and extended range.
- Turntable control button: Unique integrated dial for quick volume, track, and mode adjustments on the fly.
- Portable design: Sleek, golden‑ratio cylindrical body with pure color finishes; fits cup holders and backpack pockets.
- Universal USB‑C charging: Convenient, modern charging port for fewer cables and faster top‑ups.
- Versatile use: Ideal for home listening, outdoor adventures, and parties.

What’s in the box:
- Raymate Bluetooth Speaker
- USB‑C charging cable
- Quick start guide

Specifications:
- Bluetooth version: 5.3
- Pairing capability: Up to 100 speakers
- Drivers: Dual
- Amplifier: High‑power module
- Waterproof rating: IPX7
- Battery capacity: 3600 mAh
- Playtime: More than 15 hours (approx. 1100 minutes)
- Charging port: USB‑C
- Design: Golden‑ratio cylindrical body

Why you’ll love it:
Raymate merges premium sound with practical durability and intuitive control. From backyard BBQs to living‑room sessions, link multiple units for a wall of sound or go solo with long‑lasting battery life and effortless Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity. Set it down, dial it in, and let the music take over.
